uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

product_name.description: Switch product default name. When switch_type is ST_STACKED this parameter will be present in member wise blade object only.

product_number.description: Product Number. When switch_type is ST_STACKED this parameter will be present in member wise blade object only.

slot_id.description: Slot ID. Slot Letter A,B,C..etc in case of ST_CHASSIS type switch.

blades.description: Blades. When switch_type is ST_CHASSIS or ST_STACKED this may contain multiple blades. For ST_STANDALONE only one entry will be present.

data_ports.description: Port Information of front of the box. This is not populated for top level object.

expansion_modules.description: Expansion modules or stacking modules at the back of box. This is not populated for top level object. This object will only contain data_ports parameter.
